EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners Inquiry (1333640865.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Inquiry (1333640865.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Ken, As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on the voicemail I left you. My name is Nicolette Taylor and I’ll be responsible for answering any questions you may have and providing you an overview of our services. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you to chat using my online schedule. You may also watch a short video about who we are on YouTube. You may also look at some of the stories from indepdenents <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> who use MBO Partners. I look forward to speaking with you, Nicolette
